channel.title: Need someones help with a bit of code
channel.description:
So i have been working on this server for not to long and i was trying to add a Smithing and Mining shop to an area and this is the code i came up with for it [code] } else if (NPCID == 529) { // Smithing and Mining Shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 46; //Smithing and Mining Shop [/code] I put that in the client.java of course
this was in shops.cfg [code]shop = 46 Mining_and_Smithing_Shop 1 1 453 50 451 15000 449 1200 447 600 444 250 440 100 438 50 436 50 [/code]
This is in the autospawn.cfg [code]spawn = 529 2830 3352 0 0 0 0 0 1 Smithing_and_Mining_supplies[/code]
what did i do wrong?

item.title: Need someones help with a bit of code
item.dc:creator: @I_Am_King I Am King
item.description:
@I_Am_King wrote:

Well when i compiled i got 100 errors and this has happened before then i went and changed like 1 thing and it fixed it but i dont know whats wrong

i know that the 100 errors has to deal with a missing or extra bracket and i just fixed that now i get this error

client.java:12840: orphaned case case 21:

PutNPCCoords = true;
